Description.Text:
The Southcrest Manor Hotel in Redditch was originally a manor house and is set in 7 acres of woodland and landscaped gardens and is perfect for a weekend escape.

The Southcrest Manor Hotel in Redditch, is ideally located for both the business and leisure traveler, within easy distance of the midland Motorway network and is only 20 minutes from Birmingham Airport, the National Exhibition Centre and the National Indoor Arena in central Birmingham.

Experience our elegant conservatory, which overlooks the Vale of Evesham. You will be staying close to Forge Mill and Bordesley Abbey, one of the most extensively excavated Abbeys in the country. Not only that, but there are many exciting places to visit if you want to venture a bit further such as Warwick Castle, Warwick Races and Cadbury World. NOTE: The Hotel has a planned refurbishment commencing mid October and finishing in December 2009.

There are a host of attractions close by to the Southcrest Hotel in Redditch, including:

- Cadburys World
- NEC
- Bullring Shopping Centre
- Droitwich Spa Brine Bath Complex
- Forge Mill Needle Museum
- Bromsgrove Museum
- Warwick Castle
- Severn Valley Railway
- West Midlands Safari Park
- Droitwich Spa Heritage Centre
- Ragley Hall
- Royal Worcester
- White Cottage Garden & Cranesbill Nursery
- Kinwarton Dovecote

STANDARD - GUEST_ROOM - Single bedded room fully equipped with en-suite facilities, hairdryer, trouser press, direct dial telephone, complimentary tea and coffee and wireless high speed internet access.
STANDARD - GUEST_ROOM - Twin bedded room fully equipped with en-suite facilities, hairdryer, trouser press, direct dial telephone, complimentary tea and coffee and wireless high speed internet access.
STANDARD - GUEST_ROOM - Double bedded room fully equipped with en-suite facilities, hairdryer, trouser press, direct dial telephone, complimentary tea and coffee and wireless high speed internet access.
